page.title: 09LANDSCAPE BURSLEM TOWN-HALL.
page.content: In the middle of Burslem is the Town Hall,but it is nowadays used as a leisure centre.The rooms can be hired by members of the public for meetings or to practice playing instruments or dancing in,and there are certain rooms that are just for sport.Thereis a room with a multi-gym in it,and another for badmington.Some of the activities that take place there are:weight-lifting, Kung-Fu,break-dancing and second hand record sales. The Town Hall is owned by the Council and people who use the rooms and facilities have to pay a fee for hiring the rooms.The cost varies depnding on what you use,and if you are a pensioner or you are unemployed the fees are reduced. Thisw an attempt to provide leisure facilitiesin an area where there are very few.
